code: import axios from"axios";export var GET_INVENTORY_LIST="GET_INVENTORY_LIST";export var GET_INVENTORY_DETAIL="GET_INVENTORY_DETAIL";export var POST_INVENTORY_CREATE="POST_INVENTORY_CREATE";export var PUT_INVENTORY_EDIT="PUT_INVENTORY_EDIT";export var GET_LOGGING_LIST='GET_LOGGING_LIST';var url="https://smpnapi.herokuapp.com/api/v3/";var header={headers:{Authorization:"JWT ".concat(localStorage.getItem('token'))}};export var getInventoryList=function getInventoryList(){return function(dispatch){axios.get(url+'inventory/',header).then(function(response){dispatch({type:GET_INVENTORY_LIST,payload:{data:response.data.Inventory,errorMessage:false}});}).catch(function(error){dispatch({type:GET_INVENTORY_LIST,payload:{data:false,errorMessage:error.message}});});};};export var getLoggingList=function getLoggingList(){return function(dispatch){axios.get(url+'logging/',header).then(function(response){dispatch({type:GET_LOGGING_LIST,payload:{data:response.data.logging,errorMessage:false}});}).catch(function(error){dispatch({type:GET_LOGGING_LIST,payload:{data:false,errorMessage:error.message}});});};};export var getInventoryDetail=function getInventoryDetail(logical_uid){return function(dispatch){axios.get(url+'inventory/detail/'+logical_uid,header).then(function(response){console.log(response);dispatch({type:GET_INVENTORY_DETAIL,payload:{data:response.data,errorMessage:false}});}).catch(function(error){dispatch({type:GET_INVENTORY_DETAIL,payload:{data:false,errorMessage:error.message}});});};};export var postInventoryCreate=function postInventoryCreate(data){return function(dispatch){axios.post(url+'inventory/',data,header).then(function(response){console.log(response);dispatch({type:POST_INVENTORY_CREATE,payload:{data:response.data,errorMessage:false}});}).catch(function(error){dispatch({type:POST_INVENTORY_CREATE,payload:{data:false,errorMessage:error.message}});});};};export var deleteInventory=function deleteInventory(logical_uid){return function(dispatch){axios.delete(url+'inventory/'+logical_uid,header).then(function(response){console.log(response);}).catch(function(error){console.log(error);});};};export var deleteDataInventory=function deleteDataInventory(){return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:GET_INVENTORY_DETAIL,payload:{data:false,errorMessage:false}});dispatch({type:POST_INVENTORY_CREATE,payload:{data:false,errorMessage:false}});};};export var putInventoryUpdate=function putInventoryUpdate(data,id){return function(dispatch){axios.put(url+'inventory/'+id,data,header).then(function(response){console.log(response);dispatch({type:PUT_INVENTORY_EDIT,payload:{data:response.data,errorMessage:false}});}).catch(function(error){dispatch({type:PUT_INVENTORY_EDIT,payload:{data:false,errorMessage:error.message}});});};};
